abstract: Police officials and women's groups applaud a recommendation by a Federal Bureau of Investigation subcommittee that the definition of rape used by the agency be expanded.
snippet: The definition, written more than 80 years ago, has been criticized as too narrow, resulting in thousands of rapes being excluded from the Federal Bureau of Investigation’s annual Uniform Crime Report.
lead_paragraph: The definition, written more than 80 years ago, has been criticized as too narrow, resulting in thousands of rapes being excluded from the Federal Bureau of Investigation’s annual Uniform Crime Report.

headline.main: Support for Move to Broaden Definition of Rape
headline.print_headline: Support for Move to Broaden Definition of Rape
